beverage.name: Corona
beverage.description: Corona is a Mexican lager beer with a pale straw color, medium white head, and a subtle hop nose. It has a crisp, clean flavor with notes of fruit, honey, and malt, and a touch of hoppy skunkiness. Corona is well-balanced between hops and malt, and has a refreshing taste that's not too complex.

beverage.name: Heineken
beverage.description: Heineken is a pale lager beer with 5% alcohol by volume (ABV). It's made with malted barley, hops, water, and Heineken A-yeast, a proprietary yeast strain developed in 1886.

beverage.name: Mojito
beverage.description: Cool off with this easy mojito recipe! Made with rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and fresh mint, this refreshing Cuban cocktail

beverage.name: Merlot
beverage.description: German Beer

beverage.name: Caipirinha
beverage.description: A caipirinha is Brazil's national cocktail, made with cachaça, sugar, and lime. Cachaça is a hard liquor made from sugarcane, giving it a slightly sweeter taste than tequila. A caipirinha is a refreshing summertime cocktail that's great for beginners to cachaça.

beverage.name: Modelo
beverage.description: A rich, full-flavored Pilsner-style lager with notes of orange blossom honey and a hint of herb. Some say it's perfectly balanced and has a golden hue, while others say it's too rich for fans of light beer.

beverage.name: Corona

It has a crisp, clean flavor with notes of fruit, honey, and malt, and a touch of hoppy skunkiness. Corona is well-balanced between hops and malt, and has a refreshing taste that's not too complex.

beverage.name: Heineken

beverage.name: Guinness
beverage.description: Guinness is a rich, creamy, ruby red Irish stout with a unique and consistently smooth flavor. It's made with water, malted barley, roasted barley, hops, nitrogen, and yeast, and has a dark color and intense burnt flavor. Guinness is medium and balanced, with roasted character and subtle fermentation fruitiness. It has a creamy head and a full body, with notes of chocolate and coffee
